response.overview: A short film about an unnamed character's obsession with walls being shattered in an instant. I wanted to experiment with this film, hence the strange premise. The film was directed, edited and filmed by me and I was also responsible for the base story. A lot of the film was highly improvised and I would decide on what direction to take the film as we walked around looking for walls. This film was really fun to make and I learnt a lot about film-making in the process.
response.title: Templar Film Trilogy
